page.title: 02Transport
page.content: The roads around our block are not very wide so that when lorries come through there is not very much space. There are pot holes which need filling in. In the winter the roads are deep in snow and the villages are often cut off for short periods. The only main road is the B4077, Tewkesbury to Stow on the Wold,road. The nearest motorway is 15 miles away(M5) and there are mainline railway stations at Moreton in Marsh and Kingham, both of which are about 10 miles away. There is a daily bus service to Cheltenham and a weekly bus to Moreton market.
